name: 董容辰
objective:
1. Laser Resonator 
2. Temporal Dynamics of Lasers 
3. Nonlinear Optics
schedule:
Introduction (1 week)
Laser Resonator (4 weeks)
Temporal Dynamics of Lasers (2 weeks)
Midterm Exam
Temporal Dynamics of Lasers (2 weeks)
Nonlinear Optics (5 weeks)
Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam: 20% (Submission of on-site coding exam)
Final Exam: 20% (Submission of on-site coding exam)
Homework: 60% (Based on 10 coding assignments)

Note: Proficiency in Matlab basics is required.
materials:
Lasers, A. E. Siegman
Laser Electronics, Joseph T. Verdeyen
consultation: Office Hours: Fri 17:00~19:00To reserve a time, please email in advance to jungchen.tung@mail.ntut.edu.tw
